text: Aleksandr Motin (Russian: Александр Мотин; born 16 January 1944) is a Soviet rower. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich with the men's coxless four where they came fourth. ==References== == External links == * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Aleksandr Motin
